spell_list.description: Inflicts melee damage on the target. The damage is double if the guardian is not the enemy's current target. Applies additional damage and damage reduction to the guardian when the guardian uses their next combat art. Higher ranks of this ability lower the base reuse time. The triggered effects can increment up to three times each.
spell_list.description_pvp: Inflicts melee damage on the target. The damage is double if the guardian is not the enemy's current target. Applies additional damage and damage reduction to the guardian when the guardian uses their next combat art. Higher ranks of this ability lower the base reuse time. The triggered effects can increment up to three times each.

effect_list.description: Applies Protector's Grit.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.
When a combat art is used this spell will cast Grit on target of combat art.  Lasts for 10.0 seconds.
Loses an increment when the guardian takes damage equal to or greater than the amount of damage reduction
Inflicts 8 - 14 slashing damage on target
Reduces all damage done to caster by 3%
Inflicts double damage if the guardian is not tanking the target
Inflicts 2 - 3 melee damage on target

spell_list.name: Defender's Charge
